# Fixtures Index

This directory contains test fixtures for preview rendering, source binding, wizard flows, and navigation behaviors.

Fixtures are now physically organized by category folders.

## Lua Config Binding

- `lua-config/player.config.md` + `lua-config/player_config.lua`
- `lua-config/items.config.md` + `lua-config/items_config.lua`
- `lua-config/quest_system.config.md` + `lua-config/quest_system.lua`
- `lua-config/game_events.config.md` + `lua-config/game_events.lua`
- `lua-config/perf_test.config.md` + `lua-config/perf_test_config.lua`

## JSON Config Binding

- `json-config/game_json.config.md` + `json-config/game_json_config.json`

## Wizard Fixtures

### Run Action

- `wizard-run/release_wizard.config.md`
- `wizard-run/json_release_wizard.config.md`
- `wizard-run/task_create_wizard.config.md`
- `wizard-run/item_create_wizard.config.md`

### Prompt Action

- `wizard-prompts/prompt_release_wizard.config.md`
- `wizard-prompts/slua-unreal-actor-prompt.config.md`

## slua-unreal Integration

- `slua/slua-game-state.config.md` + `slua/slua-game-state.lua`

## Markdown Rendering

- `markdown/markdown_features.config.md`
